page.title: 07HEALTH IN TICKHILL
page.content: Tickhill has a{clinic}which has five doctors,and a district nurse which visits daily.A chiropodist visits once a week.Also there is a full time health visitor.There is both Ante- natal and Post-natal clinics and a family planning clinic.There is a well baby clinic for testing and immunisations.There is also a{dentist with his own seperate surgery.There is no hospital in Tickhill so for specialised treatment or in the case of an emergency there is an eight mile journey to Doncaster Royal Infirmary. This is a large{hospital}complex able to deal with almost all problems. On entering school children have a full medical,and have their hearing and eyesight screened regularly throughout their school years.There is also a school dentist who comes to check the children's teeth.
